alert.note: Alert for Rains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:40PM CDT until June 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL VAN ZANDT AND SOUTHERN RAINS COUNTIES... At 539 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fruitvale, or 7 miles northeast of Canton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Edgewood, Emory, Fruitvale, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Fork Reservoir, Myrtle Springs, Oakland, Jones, Flats and Pruitt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
